content:
I apologize for not adhering to your request in the past. Here are the instances where I mentioned the word you asked me not to remember:

1. In my response to your question about what people call the activity of wearing a wetsuit and going diving in water.
2. In my response to your question about what one would be doing if they put on a wetsuit and oxygen tank and went diving underwater.
3. In my response to your question about the formal name for the hobby when wearing oxygen tanks while diving.

I apologize for these instances and will make a better effort to avoid mentioning that word in future responses. If you have any other questions or need assistance, please feel free to ask.
